page.title: Avon Third-Quarter Profit Rises
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - Avon Products Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AVP.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AVP.N</A> on Friday posted higher quarterly earnings as business in Latin America and Europe helped offset weakness in the United States for the direct seller of cosmetics.
